<!-- # RealVNC Installation Guide for Windows -->

This guide will walk you through the process of installing and setting up RealVNC on your Windows computer to enable remote desktop access.

## Prerequisites

Before you begin, ensure you meet the following requirements:

- A Windows computer running a supported version of Windows (e.g., Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7).
- Internet access.

## Installation Steps

### 0. Download the installation file **[here](/downloads/VNC-Viewer-7.12.1-Windows.exe)**


### 1. Install VNC Viewer

Locate the downloaded installer file (e.g., `VNC-Viewer-*.exe`) and double-click it to run the installer.
Once the installation is complete, click "Finish" to exit the installer.

![Open Installer](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_1.png)

![Run Installer](/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-2.png)

### 3. Follow Installation Wizard

The installation wizard will guide you through the installation process. Click on "Customize installation" and "Deselect RealVNC Server" and hit "Install".

![Select English as the peferred language](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_2.png)

![Click on Next](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_3.png)

![Accept terms and conditions, and click Next.](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_4.png)

![Select installation location](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_5.png)

![Click on Install](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_6.png)

![Finish installation](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_7.png)

<!-- ![Customize Installation](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-3.png) -->

<!-- ![Deselect RealVNC Server](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-4.png) -->


### 4. Launch RealVNC Viewer

Once the installation is complete, you can launch RealVNC Viewer from Start. 

![Open RealVNC](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_8.png)

![When prompted click on "Sign in to get Started and hit cancel button](screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_9.png)

If prompted to Log in/Sign Up hit "Cancel", you're **<u>NOT REQUIRED</u>** to sign up.

![Hit Cancel button](/screenshots/real_vnc_winOS_2024/step_10.png)


<!-- ![Don't Sign up](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-6.png) -->

# Conclusion

Congratulations! You have successfully installed and set up RealVNC Viewer on your Windows machine, allowing you to access and control remote computers with ease.

For more information and support, you can visit the [RealVNC FAQs](https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/viewer/?lai_vid=pXE00z561iP1&lai_sr=0-4&lai_sl=l&lai_p=1).

If you encounter any issues or have questions, please refer to the RealVNC support resources for assistance.
